testcase.classname: To Test search button module functionality
testcase.name: To verify user can enter from location
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Button Homepage............................................passed When user clicks on the fromtextbox.........................................passed Then he should enter the From place details.................................passed When user clicks on the Totextbox...........................................passed Then he should enter the to place details...................................passed Then choose the date........................................................passed And click on search button..................................................passed

testcase.name: To verify user can sort location
testcase.system-out: Given user is on sorting Homepage...........................................passed When user clicks on the Fromtextbox.........................................passed Then he should enter the Fromplace details..................................passed When user clicks on the To textbox..........................................passed Then he should enter the Toplace details....................................passed Then choose the date of travel..............................................passed And click on search Button..................................................passed Then click on departure sort................................................passed And Then click on the duration sort.........................................passed Then Click on the Arrival sort..............................................passed And Then click on Ratings sort..............................................passed Then click on Fare sort.....................................................passed And Then click on Seatsavailable sort.......................................passed

testcase.name: To verify user can enter To location
testcase.system-out: Given user is on To Homepage................................................passed When user clicks on Totextbox...............................................passed Then he should enter the To details.........................................passed

testcase.name: To verify user can enter from location
testcase.system-out: Given user is on From Homepage.............................................passed When user clicks on fromtextbox.............................................passed Then he should enter the from details.......................................passed

testcase.name: To verify user can enter The Date
